Title: Einhell 4431119 TE-AG 18 Li Power X-Change Angle Grinder 115mm 18V 1 x 3.0Ah Li-ion EINTEAG18LK
Description:
The Einhell TE-AG 18 Li Kit Power X-Change Angle Grinder is supplied with:

1 x 18V 3.0Ah Li-ion Battery.
1 x Charger.
1 x Carry Case.

The Einhell TE-AG 18 Li Power X-Change Angle Grinder is a very handy, compact tool and is the lightest angle grinder of its class. It has a robust, aluminium gear housing and a very smooth operation thanks to the separation of motor and gearing.

The soft start function and restart safeguard make it safer to use and there is an overload cut-out for a long service life. The modified air guidance provides better cooling and the disc guard has a quick-adjust facility. The slimline design has been fitted with ergonomic, soft grip surfaces and the additional handle can be fitted flexibly in 3 positions.

It is a member of the Power X-Change family and is powered by Lithium-ion rechargeable batteries with a battery management system for a long life.

Specifications:

No Load Speed: 8,500/min.
Disc Diameter: 115mm.
Max Cutting Depth: 28mm.
Weight: 1.21kg.
